parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The query token. Set the value to the value of **NextToken** that is returned in the last call.

> You do not need to configure this parameter if you call this operation for the first time.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**, which indicates an Anti-DDoS Pro instance in the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs in Resource Management.

If you do not configure this parameter, the instance belongs to the default resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: An array consisting of IDs of the Anti-DDoS Pro instances that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource to which the tag belongs. Set the value to **INSTANCE**, which indicates an Anti-DDoS Pro instance.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array consisting of tags that you want to query. Each tag consists of a tag **key** and a tag **value**.
